oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Departments, Boards, and Agencies Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The final report established the rules, conditions, and general provisions for all administrative boards and commissions following consolidation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Executive departments--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
